channel.title: Please Help Me With My Server Problem
channel.description:
Ok so here is what I got, I start my runserver.bat file then open my Runescape Client and put in my username and password and it loads when its done the message box says welcome ("players name") Then the server disconnects and saves the player data.... This Is What My runserver.bat command says:
CrazyGoose Scape v.1 --------Server Is Now Online Thank You For Shopping-------- Connection accepted from localhost: 4738. Client type: high memory version UserId: 15360669 CrazyGoose is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Game saved for player CrazyGoose ClientHandler: Client CrazyGoose disconnected.
This Is My Runserver.bat File:
@echo off color 0a title CrazyGoose Scape v.1 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
Can Someone Please Help me figure out what is going wrong???????

item.title: Please Help Me With My Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @Dblocknc005 Dblocknc005
item.description:
@Dblocknc005 wrote:

Ok so here is what I got, I start my runserver.bat file then open my Runescape Client and put in my username and password and it loads when its done the message box says welcome (“players name”) Then the server disconnects and saves the player data… This Is What My runserver.bat command says:

CrazyGoose Scape v.1
--------Server Is Now Online Thank You For Shopping--------
Connection accepted from localhost: 4738.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 15360669
CrazyGoose is signing onto server.
LOADED: 3
Game saved for player CrazyGoose
ClientHandler: Client CrazyGoose disconnected.

This Is My Runserver.bat File:

@echo off
color 0a
title CrazyGoose Scape v.1
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Can Someone Please Help me figure out what is going wrong???
